remarks.format: ## Remarks 경우는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> 속성을 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> 개체 함께 설정에 지정 된 인증서는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> 속성은 무시 됩니다.
